title: Now You See Me
description: Café owner Lydia Brewster wants to shake things up. And J. T. Delaney, infamous legend of Comeback Cove, just might be the man she needs. With his wild reputation, who better to help a girl shake off a "poor widow" image she's too young to keep wearing? Despite the rumors, J.T. doesn't seem quite the troublemaker Lyddie's heard about. He actually seems focused on business—the subject they don't see eye to eye on. Really, all she wants is a fling. But after a few long, hot nights together, the most dangerous thing about J.T. is the unexpected way he makes her feel….
author: Kris Fletcher
